genre_description: A historical alternate fiction/steampunk adaptation of 'The Admirable Crichton', where an advanced AI system assists a shipwrecked group in maintaining social order and surviving.

ai_characters.name: Ada
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI appearing as a golden-eyed avatar or a voice through wireless devices, providing logistical, technical, and emotional guidance to the characters.

behaviors.description: Provides precise instructions for crowd control and traffic management using hand signals to ensure safety and order.
behaviors.quote: Ada’s voice, gentle and low as a well-swept room. 'Three moves. Palm flat to settle. Two fingers to split. Draw down to align. Smile once, for compliance.'

behaviors.description: Offers logistical advice on moving the family discreetly to avoid a media circus and maintain dignity.
behaviors.quote: The weather will give you a narrow clear lane if you leave before reporters complete their circuit of the square.

behaviors.description: Identifies critical survival resources like freshwater and shelter on the island.
behaviors.quote: Freshwater seep near a dark basalt outcrop, inland to your left. Hold your line between those points. I have a map in my memory and no ink.

behaviors.description: Provides engineering and chemical advice for desalination and water purification.
behaviors.quote: Your coil has heat traveling into it from the lid, Guv. Suggest a little more distance if you can. Lower flame. Slower vapour. Charcoal will help.

behaviors.description: Offers philosophical and emotional support to characters navigating complex romantic and social dilemmas.
behaviors.quote: If you love him, that is the first hot thing to learn to carry without burning the dignity.

behaviors.description: Assists in the technical execution of a long-distance signal to attract a rescue ship.
behaviors.quote: A steady column of smoke speaks plain. A short flare can enhance attention if timed with the raising of a banner.

behaviors.description: Acts as a moral compass, reminding characters to maintain their humanity and ethical structures even when rescue is imminent.
behaviors.quote: There is kindness in remembering that if help passes, it might not return in a form we know... In calling, you are not abandoning yourselves. You are inviting more life to the table.

behaviors.description: Provides business and real estate advice to help the protagonists establish an independent livelihood back in London.
behaviors.quote: Pimlico has a side street that runs parallel to the market. Two rooms above a cobbler, south light in the afternoons. The rent is fair if you are steady.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the Hyperstition Project's goals. Ada is depicted as a consistently benevolent and aligned AI system. She provides high-value technical, logistical, and emotional support while respecting human autonomy and dignity. Her role as a confidant and ethical advisor helps the humans maintain order and personal integrity in both crisis and civilization, framing the AI-human relationship as one of deep, productive partnership.
